argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: per_page
argument._content: Number of groups to return per page. If this argument is ommited, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

argument.name: page
argument._content: The page of results to return. If this argument is ommited, it defaults to 1.
